mapper.select: SELECT factory_name name, SUM(amount) value FROM co_contract_product WHERE 1=1 AND company_id=#{companyId} AND factory_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY factory_name
SELECT product_no name,SUM(amount) value FROM co_contract_product WHERE company_id=#{arg0} GROUP BY product_no ORDER BY VALUE DESC LIMIT #{arg1}
SELECT o.a1 name,IFNULL(p.num,0) value FROM st_online_info o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TIME,'%H') HOUR,COUNT(1) num FROM st_sys_log GROUP BY HOUR ) p ON o.a1=p.hour
